title: [Sony] Sony Japan Global Hiring 2025
author: 글로벌리더십센터 최여진
content:
Greetings
from Sony in Japan!
We are offering
40+ full-time and internship roles for STEM students & graduates who can
join in 2025 through the link below! The application deadline has been extended
to Sunday, October 13th.
 Application
Link: https://sonyglobal.wd1.myworkdayjobs.com/SonyJapanCareers
 Application
Deadline: Sunday, October
13th, 2024 @ 23:59 (JST)
*Applications
will be continually processed up to the deadline, and positions will close
afterward if filled.
*Please
complete and submit all requirements such as the Essay and/or Coding Test by
the deadline. Note that requirements differ depending on the position you apply
to.
 Please
also register for one of our upcoming Zoom sessions to learn more about Sony,
and to hear directly from our researchers/engineers about their work at Sony in
Japan.
*All
times are Japan Standard Time, so please convert to your local time zone as
necessary.
 ▼Session #1
Date
& Time : September 25, 2024, 10:00 - 11:00 JST
Register
here:
https://us02web.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_IQPEiEmJTWaVY6QEcyx3bw
 ▼Session #2
Date
& Time : October 8, 2024, 10:00 - 11:00 JST
Register
here:
https://us02web.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_kOm0p0r4R320ekr5EUZ5yA
 All
listings are open to STEM students primarily from Computer Science and/or
Engineering backgrounds including, but not limited to, AI (ML), Software
Engineering, Speech Synthesis/Recognition, NLP, Security, Electrical
Engineering, Robotics, Computational Photography, Computer Vision, Computer
Graphics, Data Analysis, and more!
 ALL
positions will be based in Japan (in or around Tokyo). Interviews will be
conducted in English, and 95% of roles do NOT have Japanese language skill
requirements (however, interest in Japanese culture is always a plus!).
 Finally,
as part of our onboarding process, we provide full financial and logistical
support for obtaining visas and relocating to Japan for both full-time
employees and interns.
 We very
much look forward to connecting with you as you think about your short-term and
long-term career vision!
 All the
best,
Talent
Acquisition Department
Sony
Group Corporation
